intro: Ptilochaeta densiflora, commonly known as the dense-flowered featherstem, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features slender, hairy stems and dense clusters of small, yellowish flowers. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in fynbos vegetation. Ptilochaeta densiflora is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in supporting local pollinators.
